Text: Thanks {wasalnaser}, and thanks for ignoring that queer kike or cow worshiper.  If those pigs knew how to Fast, they wouldn't all be so ugly and obese and could maybe move out of their momma's basement and get a girlfriend instead of having sex with other fat queer kikes!
